# NEWS 

## ISMI WORKSHOP

There will be ISMI Beam-line workshop devoted to highlights of the research as well as the proposed upgrade.

The title of the workshop is *Dive into nano-world*

More information and registration at the following website:

http://ssls.nus.edu.sg/workshop/ismi.html

## ISMI beamline upgrade

Proposed upgrade includes new FTIR spectrometer, new FTIR microscope with FPA detector and near-field system for nanoscale IR and s-SNOM.
